name: Harm
description:
Controls:

W-Move forward

A-Move Left

D-Move Right

Space-Jump

X-Return To Main Menu

Moving Around With Mouse-Look Around

Clicking-Shoot bullets

Go Through Doors-Enter key

Note: It is recommended to use a mouse to aim. This game was designed with the intent of using a mouse to aim.

Description:

Harm is a singleplayer first-person shooter. In this game, the player goes through two levels and must reach a door in each level to complete the level. If the player dies, the player will have to restart the game. Therefore, the player must learn how to survive from harmful enemies. 

Features:

*Two carefully designed levels with plenty of cover.

*Regenerating health. 

*Excellent and intuitive UI.

*Difficult gameplay. 

*Great gunshot soundeffects.
